SEARCH
Package DepartmentObject

Class AccountInfoDatabase

java.lang.Object
DepartmentObject.AccountInfoDatabase
public class AccountInfoDatabase extends Object
The AccountInfoDatabase class handles the login of the Hospital Management System.

An instance of this class works off of one database (one text file), allowing the Hospital Management System to include multiple login systems for different application if needed.

Username and Password is obtained and passed into this class which is then encrypted to match with the encrypted account details in the database and returns the UniqueID of that user.

New account is given the default Password of "Password" and will be prompted to change their Password on their first login.

      public String login()
      Login method that takes in the Username and Password of the user and verify the details.

      If it is the first time logging in, it prompts the user to change their password

      the UniqueID of the user

    • checkPassword

      public static String checkPassword()
      Checks for a new password and making sure it meets the requirements of:
      • 8 - 14 characters long
      • Contains digit
      • Contains upper and lower case
      • Contains special characters {e.g. ! @ # $ % ^ invalid input: '&' * ( ) }
      Returns:
      the new password to be changed to
